definition: surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Leon Trotsky was assassinated near Mexico City.
sentences.chinese: 托洛斯基在墨西哥城附近遇刺。

sentences.english: But the consensus around the Gulf Coast is turning more apoplectic and apocalyptic.
sentences.chinese: 但在墨西哥湾海岸的舆论正变得越来越激烈和末世论。

sentences.english: He moved to northern New Mexico shortly after graduating in 1969.
sentences.chinese: 1969年毕业后不久，他搬到新墨西哥州北部。

sentences.english: Leyzaola moved his family out of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 拉伊佐拉将自己的家庭搬出了墨西哥。

sentences.english: The "mex" endpoint allows other applications to discover the capabilities of the service.
sentences.chinese: 在“墨西哥”端点允许其他应用程序发现服务的能力。

sentences.english: Canada, Mexico and the United Kingdom won t provide much impetus.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大，墨西哥和英国不会提供很多的动力。

sentences.english: Burritos and tacos similarly have their origins in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 玉米饼以及玉米面豆卷发源于墨西哥。

sentences.english: Mexico has reported 397 confirmed human cases of infection, including 16 deaths.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥报告397名确诊病例，包括16名死亡病例。

sentences.english: Mexico achieved independence from Spain in 1821.
sentences.chinese: 1821年的今天，墨西哥脱离西班牙取得独立。

sentences.english: Many countries, for example Mexico and Japan, have a lot of earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家是地震多发区，如墨西哥和日本。

sentences.english: What do you say to the Mexican people?
sentences.chinese: 您想对墨西哥人民说些什么？

sentences.english: Take the example of drip irrigation for small farmers in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 以供墨西哥个体农民使用的滴灌为例。

sentences.english: The Compass is also manufactured in Brazil and will furthermore be manufactured in Mexico and India.
sentences.chinese: 指南者也在巴西生产，并将扩展到墨西哥与印度制造。

sentences.english: Traffic encircles the Angel of Independence monument on Mexico City’s Paseo de la Reforma.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥城改革大道，车辆环绕独立天使纪念碑行驶。

sentences.english: Trading Company, which deal with chili , spices, peanuts, gar…
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥公司求购经营辣椒，香辛料，花生，大蒜。

sentences.english: The bus was traveling from Monterrey, Mexico to Houston.
sentences.chinese: 这辆巴士但是正从墨西哥蒙特雷市驶往美国休斯顿。

definition: Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
